Text:
This is definitely *NOT* a fake.  I've seen this movie before and am halfway through downloading it now.  I've previewed it and it is a very high quality rip of Lantana. 

Thanks to the releaser.  This is going to replace an old-&-not-very-good 1 CD version. Good release.

user Xtinguish spams a lot of new releases with the same crap, ignore it.
